subject: p12433421
Findings: The right central line tip sits in the mid SVC. The cardiomediastinal contours are unchanged. The lungs continue to demonstrate mild bibasilar atelectasis. The previously described left pleural effusion has decreased. There is no pneumothorax.
Impression: Bibasilar atelectasis with decrease in left pleural effusion no pneumothorax.
